data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Draa Tafilalet, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Draa Tafilalet, Morocco
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Draa Tafilalet, Morocco to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Draa Tafilalet, Morocco.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 1,180 believers in Draa Tafilalet.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Berber, Zekara people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Berber, Zekara people.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Draa Tafilalet who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Draa Tafilalet, Morocco.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary:
the state of Draa Tafilalet, Morocco has a population of 1,125,800.

We estimate Draa Tafilalet has 1,180 people who might know Jesus, 945 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,123,675 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 954 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,180 believers in Draa Tafilalet and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
